entries.journal_entry_description: Rylen recommends learning how to use the resources harvested off creatures.
entries.task02_journal_entry_description: The guards are getting mauled by the bocatts in the lower level of the station. Make 3 Lecepanine Darts from the hide and bone of the bocatts to help them tranqualize these beasts. Because each dart has 5 uses, 3 should be enough for now.
entries.task03_journal_entry_description: In the event that the tranquilizer darts do not work, the guards will need to kill the bocatts.  Make 3 Wire Mesh Traps from their hide and bone to reduce their defenses against melee attacks.
entries.task04_journal_entry_title: This is the spot where the player gives the traps to the NPC
entries.task05_journal_entry_description: Now that you have given the traps to Rylen, claim your payment.
